did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia Records, 1961-2001
did.physloc: Note: Boxes 1-14 of this collection are in off-site storage and require 2-3 days notice for retrieval. Please contact Special Collections for more information. (Box 15 contains the VHS tapes and is located on-site.)
did.abstract: The League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia, records, is composed of correspondence, chapter and national league literature and publications, bulletins, candidate questionnaires, meeting minutes and agendas, budget and financial information, bank statements, returned checks, and treasurer's reports.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: League of Women Voters. Montgomery County (Va.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia Records must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia Records, Ms1997-016, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Initials materials from the League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia Records were donated to Special Collections in September 1997. Additional materials were donated between 1998 and 2002 and in 2003/2004.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the initial donation of League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia Records commenced and was completed in October 1998. Later donations were processed in November 2012 and January 2013.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The National League of Women Voters was established in 1920, as women in the United States were granted the right to vote, to educate women on how best to exercise their new political rights and responsibilities. Although the programs and priorities have changed over the years, the league is still committed to the following basic purposes: to foster citizen involvement and develop citizen leaders, to help people understand public issues and how government works, to promote discussion of government policies, and to influence public policy.

The League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia, was established on March 28, 1974, with its purpose to promote political responsibility through informed and active participation of citizens in government. Their policy is that they do not support or oppose any political party or candidate, but to take positions on certain issues and support or oppose legislative measures. Any person is eligible for membership who subscribes to the purpose and policy of the league. Voter services include providing information on registration and voting, giving public forums to present candidates, and supplying candidate questionnaire information for news organizations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The League of Women Voters of Montgomery County, Virginia, records, is composed of correspondence, chapter and national league literature and publications, bulletins, candidate questionnaires, meeting minutes and agendas, budget and financial information, bank statements, returned checks, and treasurer's reports. Topics covered in the records include the Equal Rights Amendment, women in the workforce, natural resources, poverty in Montgomery County, education, and recycling. The records span between 1961 and 2001, which the majority between 1968 and 1988.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically. Undated materials are at the end.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Mary Fessler Papers, c.1940-2001 (Bulk 1967-1984). Ms2001-012. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: League of Women Voters. Montgomery County (Va.).
